MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the L15 postcode area of Liverpool, affecting properties in Strathcona Road, Grosvenor Road, Plumer Street and surrounding streets. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of the extent of repairs required and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 12am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 5:47pm on 4th November 2020.
